# genesyscloud_auth_division_home (Data Source)

Data source for Genesys Cloud Divisions. Get the Home division

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "genesyscloud_auth_division_home" "home" {}

output "home_name" {
  value = data.genesyscloud_auth_division_home.home.name
}
```
